epics.title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Enable secure login and controlled user access through enterprise identity systems.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication module that integrates with enterprise identity providers using SSO, SAML, or OAuth standards. Implement role-based access control (RBAC) and tenant isolation to ensure that users can only access cloud resources and data relevant to their specific roles and permissions. Include functionality for session management, multi-factor authentication, and detailed access logs for compliance and auditing.

epics.title: Unified Multi-Cloud Visualization Dashboard
epics.summary: Provide a single pane of glass for managing multi-cloud resources across providers.
epics.description: Design an interactive, responsive dashboard that consolidates insights from AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud. The dashboard should display cloud inventories, cost summaries, security risks, and compliance status. It must adapt to user roles to show relevant data, provide KPI widgets, and offer a unified view across all clouds. Ensure consistent user experience across desktop and mobile platforms.

epics.title: Personalized Cloud Insights and Reporting
epics.summary: Deliver customized views, reporting, and analytics based on user roles.
epics.description: Implement personalized insights for users to view cloud inventory, expenditure, and compliance summaries relevant to their roles. Allow dashboard customization to pin specific metrics and generate exportable reports. Integrate trend visualizations and dynamic filtering options to support proactive financial and operational decision-making within organizations.

epics.title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Resource Discovery
epics.summary: Develop seamless onboarding of cloud accounts and automated resource discovery.
epics.description: Implement secure workflows for onboarding AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud accounts using service principals or API credentials. Automate resource discovery across all onboarded clouds and periodically sync metadata to maintain an up-to-date inventory. Handle API rate limits, credential validation, and connectivity issues gracefully, ensuring reliable integration with all providers.

epics.title: Data Normalization and Multi-Cloud Aggregation
epics.summary: Normalize and aggregate multi-cloud data for unified representation.
epics.description: Create processing mechanisms to normalize resource metadata, cost data, and compliance statuses from different cloud providers into unified schemas. Use a scalable data pipeline to handle large datasets efficiently. Ensure consistent naming conventions, category mapping, and standardized metadata structures to enable consistent analysis and cross-provider comparisons.

epics.title: Cost Visibility and Optimization Analysis
epics.summary: Provide cost analytics and optimization insights across multi-cloud environments.
epics.description: Develop features to consolidate cost data from all connected cloud platforms. Incorporate analytics to identify trends, cost anomalies, and efficiency opportunities. Generate actionable recommendations such as right-sizing, instance scheduling, and storage optimizations. Deliver budget alerts, total cost summaries, and exportable cost reports for financial transparency.

epics.title: Security Posture and Compliance Management
epics.summary: Monitor the platform for security risks and compliance gaps.
epics.description: Integrate continuous monitoring for security vulnerabilities, misconfigurations, and compliance violations across all cloud providers. Map findings to industry frameworks like CIS, ISO 27001, and NIST. Provide rule-based explanations, automated remediation options, and dashboards for tracking security and compliance posture over time.

epics.title: Governance Workflows and Automation Integration
epics.summary: Enable policy enforcement and automation through CI/CD and IaC tools.
epics.description: Create governance workflows for tasks such as environment provisioning, policy enforcement, and compliance remediation. Integrate these workflows with popular CI/CD and Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools like Terraform, Ansible, and GitHub Actions. Build approval mechanisms and execution tracking to ensure controlled automation aligned with enterprise governance standards.

epics.title: Real-Time Alerts and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide proactive alerts for cost changes, security incidents, and compliance issues.
epics.description: Implement configurable real-time alerting and notification functionality. Enable rules-based alerts for unusual costs, potential security risks, and compliance violations, and deliver notifications via configurable channels such as email, SMS, and chat integrations like Slack or Microsoft Teams. Ensure detailed context and recommended actions are included in each notification.

epics.title: Auditable Activity Logging and Change History
epics.summary: Maintain detailed audit logs and immutable history of changes.
epics.description: Implement a comprehensive audit logging system that captures all user activities, API calls, configuration changes, and workflow executions. Ensure logs are encrypted, immutable, and stored securely to meet compliance and regulatory standards. Provide capabilities for users and administrators to filter, export, and analyze logs for investigations and operational transparency.

epics.title: System Scalability, Performance, and Tenant Isolation
epics.summary: Ensure consistent performance, scalability, and tenant data isolation.
epics.description: Optimize system architecture for high performance, scalability, and resilience across large enterprise workloads. Implement distributed caching, dynamic scaling, and resource load balancing. Enforce strong tenant isolation mechanisms and database partitioning to ensure data safety. Establish monitoring tools for performance metrics, API latency, and service uptime.

user_stories.epic_title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement enterprise identity provider login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to log in using enterprise identity providers such as SSO, SAML, or OAuth, so that I can access the system securely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: User authentication must be secure and comply with enterprise standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User can log in using enterprise SSO/SAML/OAuth and access the system securely.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user, when they use an enterprise identity provider, then they should be logged in securely and access the system.

user_stories.epic_title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to implement role-based access control, so that users' permissions align with their roles.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: RBAC must ensure appropriate access based on user roles.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: User permissions align with assigned roles.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they log in, then their access permissions should align with their role.

user_stories.epic_title: Enterprise Authentication and Role-Based Access Control
user_stories.title: Ensure tenant isolation and session management
user_stories.description: As a system, I want to support tenant isolation and session management, so that user data and sessions are secure in a multi-tenant environment.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Tenant isolation and session management must comply with security standards.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Tenant data and user sessions are isolated and secure.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a multi-tenant environment, when users log in, then their data and sessions should be isolated and managed securely.

user_stories.title: Design a responsive single-pane dashboard
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a responsive dashboard that provides a single-pane-of-glass experience across multiple cloud providers, so that I can manage my resources efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must be user-friendly and responsive for both desktop and mobile devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard provides a consistent user experience across AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple cloud providers, when a user accesses the dashboard, then they should have a consistent and responsive user experience.

user_stories.title: Develop personalized dashboard with role-based data views
user_stories.description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard that displays inventory, costs, and compliance data based on my role, so that I can access relevant information easily.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The dashboard must present data tailored to the user's role and permissions.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays relevant data based on the user's role and permissions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with a specific role, when they access the dashboard, then they should see data relevant to their role.

user_stories.epic_title: Cloud Account Onboarding and Resource Discovery
user_stories.title: Automate cloud account onboarding and resource discovery
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to automate the onboarding of AWS, Azure, GCP, and IBM Cloud accounts and discover resources, so that I can manage cloud resources efficiently.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Onboarding and resource discovery must be secure and handle large-scale environments.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Cloud accounts are onboarded automatically, and resources are discovered efficiently.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a cloud account, when it is onboarded, then resources should be discovered and added to the inventory automatically.

user_stories.title: Develop cost analytics and optimization insights
user_stories.description: As a financial officer, I want to track costs and receive optimization insights, so that I can manage cloud expenditure effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: The module must provide actionable cost optimization recommendations based on data.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Module provides accurate cost data and actionable optimization recommendations.
user_stories.test_cases: Given cloud expenditure data, when analyzed, then the system should provide insights and optimization recommendations.

user_stories.title: Implement continuous security and compliance monitoring
user_stories.description: As a security officer, I want continuous monitoring of security and compliance, so that I can identify and address risks proactively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Monitoring must identify risks and provide remediation guidance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System identifies and provides guidance on security and compliance issues.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a cloud environment, when monitored, then any security risks or compliance violations should be identified and remediation provided.

user_stories.title: Enable governance automation and workflow integration
user_stories.description: As a DevOps engineer, I want to automate governance workflows and integrate with CI/CD pipelines, so that I can ensure compliance and collaboration.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows must support compliance and enable cross-team collaboration.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Workflows automate governance actions and integrate with pipelines successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a governance workflow, when integrated with CI/CD, then it should trigger automatically and support approvals.

user_stories.title: Set up real-time alerts for security, cost, and compliance events
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want real-time alerts for security, cost, and compliance events, so that I can respond to issues promptly.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Alerts must be configurable and support various delivery channels.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System provides real-time alerts for configured security, cost, and compliance events.
user_stories.test_cases: Given various events, when they occur, then the system should send real-time alerts through configured channels.

user_stories.title: Maintain comprehensive and tamper-proof audit logs
user_stories.description: As an auditor, I want comprehensive and tamper-proof audit logs, so that I can review and trace system events for compliance and oversight.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Logs must be immutable, timestamped, and encrypted.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System maintains comprehensive, tamper-proof audit logs.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a system event, when it occurs, then an immutable, timestamped audit log should be created.

user_stories.epic_title: API Integrations and Data Normalization Engine
user_stories.title: Build secure API integrations for cloud data collection
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want secure API integrations to fetch and normalize cloud data, so that I can analyze and report unified data effectively.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrations must be secure, resilient, and handle large data volumes.
user_stories.core_domain_objects: API Integration, Data Normalization, Cloud Data
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System securely integrates with cloud APIs and normalizes data for analysis.
user_stories.test_cases: Given multiple cloud APIs, when integrated, then data should be fetched securely and normalized for unified analysis.

user_stories.title: Ensure system performance, scalability, and tenant isolation
user_stories.description: As a system architect, I want to ensure high performance, scalability, and tenant isolation, so that the system can handle large-scale usage securely.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: System must support scalability and data privacy for multiple tenants.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: System maintains high performance and tenant isolation under heavy load.
user_stories.test_cases: Given high system load, when tested, then the system should scale and isolate tenant data effectively.
